About.title: My Journey
About.card1_li2: Driven by the motto "Learn something new every day!", with a passion for creating scalable and innovative software solutions.
About.card1_li3: Started my programming journey in 2022 with JavaScript, deepening my studies in Python in 2023.
About.card1_li4: Currently focused on studying and developing innovative, scalable projects with Java (Spring Boot), React, NextJS, Docker, Terraform, and AWS.
About.card2_li1: My mindset was forged in soccer, treating the sport (and programming) with dedication, resilience, and teamwork.
About.card2_li2: I learned to face frustrations and never give up, a skill I apply daily when debugging code.
About.card2_li3: Furthermore, my resilience and adaptability were tested during an exchange program in Utah, USA, overcoming adaptation challenges and winning a regional soccer championship.
About.card2_li4: I consolidated my English fluency during this international experience.
About.card3_li1: Practical experience from my first major project (a portal for NGOs in PHP/MySQL) to my current responsibilities at Vivo: creating scalable solutions for daily problems.
About.card3_li2: In the short term, I want to challenge myself by developing new projects and automations to learn more and improve as a Software Engineering professional.
About.card3_li3: In the long term, the goal is to grow as a developer, ensuring my skills are applied to innovate, care for, and help people worldwide.
About.card3_li4: Deliver innovation, dedication, and care in all solutions created.

Experience.title: Work Experience
Experience.li1: Development and maintenance of production applications using Python, Flask, and MySQL.
Experience.li2: Automation of complex business processes, resulting in team efficiency optimization.
Experience.li3: Refactoring legacy systems to more modern and scalable architectures.
Experience.li4: Data analysis and modeling for extracting reports and performance metrics.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.p1_desc: Complete RESTful API with microservices, Spring Security, and AWS deploy with Docker.
Projects.p2_desc: Fullstack application with Spring Boot back-end and React front-end for financial management.
Projects.p3_desc: Fullstack app (Node.js/React) for scheduling, with full CRUD, JWT authentication, and PostgreSQL DB.
Projects.p4_desc: API in Python (FastAPI) that communicates with the local language model Ollama.
Projects.p5_desc: Java App demonstrating Dependency Injection and SOLID to process videos. Focus on architecture.
Projects.p6_desc: Web system in PHP and MySQL for NGOs/volunteers with multi-profile authentication.

Contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or an opportunity? Send me a message.
